thread.section_title: The Piccadilly London West End - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A hidden gem
thread.title_full: A hidden gem - Review of The Piccadilly London West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: SJODubai
title: A hidden gem
text:
Searching for somewhere central to stay midweek and not break the bank, this place is the answer. Perfect location, decent size rooms by London standards, great staff could not be more helpful.
The only downside is the bathrooms are a tight squeeze but everything you need is there. Also the corridor can be a little noisy, every noise from the corridor travels into the room, luckily I'm an early riser but could be annoying for some.
Complimentary Fresh fruit, Nespresso and water in the rooms, and the great free handy wifi phone perfect for overseas visitors.
